body_html:
@apaszke @bmccann @adamlerer @SeanNaren If we can agree on an API I would be happy to provide some heavy lifting.

I think supporting backwards compatibility for direct RNN modules like https://github.com/adamlerer/examples/blob/onmt3/OpenNMT/onmt/Models.py#L19-L22 would be trivial, but continued support of https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/word_language_model/model.py#L9-L11 may simply be done for the sake of supporting that method for construction.

I think the function cells should go and each RNN type should be its own module. Autograd and Stacked functions could also be incorporated into a single module.
